title: banana oat muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Line a 12-cup muffin tray with muffin cups.
In a blender, combine all ingredients except the extra oats for topping. Blend until smooth.
Pour the batter into the muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 full.
Sprinkle a few extra rolled oats on top of each muffin.
Bake for 18 minutes, or until just starting to brown. A toothpick test would also work.
Remove muffins from the tray and allow to cool.
notes: Comes together quickly and easily. If bananas aren't very ripe you can add maple syrup but I like them more bread than cake-like.
